A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi was an enjoyable movie to watch. Not only did it keep my attention throughout\, it kept me glued to the end of my seat. Sure it's not the best Star Wars movie\, and some scenes were questionable\, such as the scene where Leia flies through the air like superman\, but other than that it was a well made movie. I would strongly recommend you to watch it.
